0: A man convicted of public indecency two years ago for having sex with a pool toy is in trouble again. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Man Accused Of Having Sex With Neighbor's Pool Float A man accused of having sex with a neighbor's pool toy has had trouble with the law before. More NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR A grand jury on Wednesday indicted Edwin Tobergta on a charge of public indecency. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR According a police report, on June 15, Tobergta "stepped out of his back door, naked, and was having sexual relations with a rubber pool float." NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR "This occurred in front of several children who saw his genitals and his actions with the float," the report states. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR In 2011, Tobergta was accused of having sex with a neighbor's pool float. In 2002, a woman told police he did the same thing with an inflatable pumpkin in her yard. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR After Tobergta's 2011 arrest, a family member said Tobergta has mental issues and needed help. It's not known if he has undergone treatment. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Tobergta is being held at the Butler County jail on $25,000 bond. He's scheduled for arraignment on July 23. neighbor's jail police had with trouble
